title: SQL ServerGETUTCDATE()Function

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerGETUTCDATE()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the current UTC date and time:
SELECT 
  GETUTCDATE();

Definition and Usage
The GETUTCDATE() function returns the current database system UTC date and time, in a 
'YYYY-MM-DD hh:mm:ss.mmm' format.
Syntax
GETUTCDATE()
Technical Details
Return type:
datetime
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse

❯
★
+1
